Description: Painting in water based pigment on Italian military paper depicting a seated figure holding a chalice. In the background are two arches. Framed with a paper mount. Verso; Group of figures representing the flight into Egypt, Salome, Mary holding the infant Christ and Joseph. Above an angel guides the way.
Curator's comments: Previously part of a book of images used as models for mural paintings. These were made by an Ethiopian priest who was producing paintings and murals in the 1940s.
Acquisition notes: "Acquired from a mural painter 1/2 Day's drive from Addis Ababa" from label found with paintings.
